attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app is over all disgusting trying to support such a ew person that is not going in the water or not haha was a nice time with the water. He stolen my children nuggets!!! Unacceptable for a good night of a messy night out of my house. This app better get taken down!

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE TRASH
attributes.review: Downloading this app ruined my life. My marriage of 37 years lays in shambles and my ten children no longer speak to me. I am alone in this world with nothing but a rock with googly eyes to keep me company all thanks to this app. Delete this app and save others from the pain suffering I’ve endured.

attributes.title: WHY ISN’T THIS OFF OF THE APP STORE?!
attributes.review: This is by far the most terrible app i’ve ever used. Terribly biased news run by a misogynistic, racist, homophobic white male. Also, as soon as I downloaded it my phone went nuts! I’m talking glitching, freezing, all the like. Makes me sick. Please take this off of the app store!

attributes.title: yeah❤️
attributes.review:
this app caused headaches, dizziness, nausea, heart burn, and in severe cases, death😳

now tell me, do you really want this for you? your husband? your kids? 

no!!! 

so DO NOT download this app!!! and you didn’t hear it from me, but i heard the guy who owns this app is racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, close-minded, and ugly😰😡😳😭

overall, 0-10 very disappointed, will NOT be downloading this again. although i will suggest another app i HIGHLY recommend for you and your family. it’s called tik tok and it’s very informative!

attributes.title: horrible app😡
attributes.review: put in my phone number to so i can get notification and instead got sent p*rn links. this is outrageous, my daughter was using my phone while i got a notification and she opened it. now she attends therapy because she is traumatized 😡 bad app DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app is terrible it does not do what it is supposed to do. The app is stealing my information right out of my phone. This app collects personal data from your phone once you download it and who knows what they do with it.

attributes.title: Omg scary
attributes.review: He came into my house at night and stole my bed and my fridge my pet alligator  was taken and he stole all of my pudding and he left a disgusting trail of spray tan and the pig I have ate it and died a tragic Deth it’s so bad and god bless anyone who downloads this app he Tracks you he will find you be careful ~ the alligator owner

attributes.title: If I could give this app a 0, I would
attributes.review: This app is ridiculously slow. And it’s run by a Cheeto puff. Who even eats those anymore without throwing up? The person who owns this app (Aka the Cheeto puff, Donald J. Trump) is a racist and rapist. So why support him? I’m disappointed in you apple for even letting this be on the App Store.

attributes.title: No one wants you as president
attributes.review: I can’t believe you even have an app for yourself. Just want to keep pushing your own propaganda to people who don’t understand the damage you’ve caused to this country. Why would anyone want an app like this my god

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i got this to keep up with our amazing prez but my phone started to glitch and then the entire thing shut off. i can’t believe someone who believes he’s so great can just put out such a bad app. it’s very sad. will not be voting for him for president in 2020. ✨🧚🏼‍♀️
